alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 2:14PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Diego County through 300 PM PDT... At 214 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Descanso, or near Alpine, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ramona, Alpine, Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, San Diego Country Estates, Descanso, Hwy 78 Between Ramona And Santa Ysabel, Lakeside, Boulder Creek, Captain Grande Indian Reservation, Flinn Springs, Viejas Indian Reservation, Barona Indian Reservation and Japatul Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
